docs.text: Welcome to my personal website ! ¶ Hey, I'm Liam Collod, a french cgi artist for 6 years now. I have a strong interest for everything that is rendering-related, colors and scripting. I'm currently working on several animated short-movies as a Lookdev - Lighting and TD. I'm also doing script & apps on my free time that you can find on my Gumroad . Check my social media https://twitter.com/MrLixm https://www.linkedin.com/in/liam-collod/ https://www.artstation.com/monsieur_lixm https://github.com/MrLixm https://gumroad.com/liam_collod Mail lcollod@gmail.com [Website in construction]
